text:
Pay for three and stay for four nights at Jumeirah Dhevanafushi Published on : Tuesday, October 13, 2015
Jumeirah Dhevanafushi, part of Jumeirah Group, the Dubai-based luxury hotel company and a member of Dubai Holding, is offering guests one complimentary night stay when three nights are booked.
The offer is available until 19 December 2015 and includes complimentary breakfast and a dedicated 24-hour butler service. Each villa has a private deck with sala day beds, an outdoor rain shower and is equipped with an Apple Media Centre and complimentary wi-fi.
The exclusive boutique resort offers 37 all suite villas, each with their own private swimming pool and butler service. Choose from 13 Beach Revives, five Island Revives, three Beach Sanctuaries, 14 Ocean Revives or the two Ocean Sanctuaries. The Beach Revive Villa with Private Pool offers a bright and inviting environment with panoramic views of the ocean. For the ultimate escape, choose the Ocean Sanctuary with Private Pool which is perched above the Indian Ocean and perfectly placed to watch magnificent sunsets. Exceptionally spacious, its interior decor is inspired by the ocean and incorporates a luxurious marble bath.
The resort offers an extensive list of comforts to make your stay special. Indulge in the finest cuisine in one of the restaurants, relax and enjoy a treatment at the Talise Spa, or discover the islands vibrant coral reef and marine life on a snorkeling trip.
This heart-shaped island is located on the Gaafu Alifu Atoll, 400km from the capital Mal√© and accessed by a 20-minute speedboat ride from Khadeedhoo airport.
